/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. The buildings, painted in hues of yellow, orange, and brown, rise high into the clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding depth to the panoramic view.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars and buses fill the road, their colors muted against the vibrant backdrop of the buildings. On the sidewalks, people can be seen going about their day, adding a human element to the urban landscape.

In the foreground, a construction site is visible, hinting at the ongoing development and progress in the city. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the lively atmosphere of the street.
